marketplaces.name: MAP Framework Official Marketplace
marketplaces.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED: Plugin marketplace installation is no longer supported. Please use 'mapify init' for installation. See https://github.com/azalio/map-framework#installation for current setup instructions.

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "MAP Framework Official Marketplace",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "⚠️ DEPRECATED: Plugin marketplace installation is no longer supported. Please use 'mapify init' for installation. See https://github.com/azalio/map-framework#installation for current setup instructions.",
  "author": "azalio",
  "repository": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework",
  "plugins": [
    {
      "id": "map-framework",
      "name": "MAP Framework",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "description": "Modular Agentic Planner - Cognitive architecture for AI agents inspired by prefrontal cortex functions. Orchestrates 9 specialized agents for development with automatic quality validation.",
      "author": "azalio",
      "license": "MIT",
      "source": "github:azalio/map-framework",
      "homepage": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework",
      "repository": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework",
      "keywords": [
        "MAP",
        "ACE",
        "cognitive-architecture",
        "planning",
        "agents",
        "workflow",
        "code-review",
        "quality"
      ],
      "categories": [
        "workflow",
        "agents",
        "development"
      ],
      "features": [
        "9 specialized agents (TaskDecomposer, Actor, Monitor, Predictor, Evaluator, Reflector, Curator, Orchestrator, DocumentationReviewer)",
        "ACE learning system with persistent knowledge base",
        "5 Claude Code hooks for automation",
        "4 slash commands (/map-feature, /map-debug, /map-refactor, /map-review)",
        "Professional code review integration",
        "Cost optimization (40-60% savings)"
      ],
      "requirements": {
        "claude_code": ">=1.0.0",
        "mcp_servers": [
          "cipher",
          "claude-reviewer",
          "sequential-thinking"
        ]
      },
      "installation": {
        "command": "mapify init",
        "note": "Requires mapify CLI: uv tool install --from git+https://github.com/azalio/map-framework.git mapify-cli"
      },
      "documentation": {
        "readme": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework/blob/main/README.md",
        "installation": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework#installation",
        "hooks": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework/blob/main/.claude/hooks/README.md"
      },
      "research": {
        "map_paper": "https://github.com/Shanka123/MAP",
        "ace_paper": "https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.04618v1"
      }
    }
  ],
  "metadata": {
    "created": "2025-10-16",
    "updated": "2025-10-16",
    "total_plugins": 1
  }
}
files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "map-framework",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Modular Agentic Planner (MAP) - Cognitive architecture for AI agents with 9 specialized agents, ACE learning system, and professional code review integration",
  "author": "azalio",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/azalio/map-framework",
  "keywords": [
    "MAP",
    "ACE",
    "cognitive-architecture",
    "planning",
    "agents",
    "workflow",
    "code-review",
    "quality",
    "learning"
  ],
  "categories": [
    "workflow",
    "agents",
    "development"
  ],
  "requirements": {
    "claude_code_version": ">=1.0.0",
    "mcp_servers": [
      "cipher",
      "claude-reviewer",
      "sequential-thinking"
    ],
    "recommended_mcp_servers": [
      "context7",
      "deepwiki"
    ]
  },
  "features": [
    "9 specialized MAP agents (TaskDecomposer, Actor, Monitor, Predictor, Evaluator, Reflector, Curator, Orchestrator, DocumentationReviewer)",
    "ACE (Agentic Context Engineering) learning system with persistent knowledge base",
    "5 Claude Code hooks for automation (validate-agent-templates, auto-store-knowledge, enrich-context, session-init, track-metrics)",
    "4 slash commands (/map-feature, /map-debug, /map-refactor, /map-review)",
    "Professional code review with claude-reviewer MCP",
    "Chain-of-thought reasoning with sequential-thinking MCP",
    "Semantic pattern search with embeddings cache",
    "Cost optimization with per-agent model selection (haiku/sonnet/opus)"
  ],
  "installation": {
    "type": "git",
    "steps": [
      "Clone repository from GitHub or copy MAP framework files to your project",
      "Run 'mapify init' to initialize project with MAP agents",
      "Configure MCP servers in .claude/mcp_config.json",
      "Start using /map-* commands in Claude Code"
    ]
  },
  "documentation": {
    "readme": "README.md",
    "hooks": ".claude/hooks/README.md",
    "agents": ".claude/agents/README.md"
  },
  "included_components": {
    "agents": [
      "task-decomposer",
      "actor",
      "monitor",
      "predictor",
      "evaluator",
      "orchestrator",
      "reflector",
      "curator",
      "documentation-reviewer"
    ],
    "commands": [
      "map-feature",
      "map-debug",
      "map-refactor",
      "map-review"
    ],
    "hooks": [
      "validate-agent-templates",
      "auto-store-knowledge",
      "enrich-context",
      "session-init",
      "track-metrics"
    ]
  }
}

plugins.name: MAP Framework
plugins.description: Modular Agentic Planner - Cognitive architecture for AI agents inspired by prefrontal cortex functions. Orchestrates 9 specialized agents for development with automatic quality validation.
plugins.author: azalio
features: 9 specialized agents (TaskDecomposer, Actor, Monitor, Predictor, Evaluator, Reflector, Curator, Orchestrator, DocumentationReviewer)
ACE learning system with persistent knowledge base

installation.note: Requires mapify CLI: uv tool install --from git+https://github.com/azalio/map-framework.git mapify-cli

install_commands: /plugin install MAP Framework@MAP Framework Official Marketplace
